Package atg.process.action

Interface Summary
Action A process action.
ActionConstants Action-related constants.
 

Class Summary
ActionImpl An abstract base class which can be used by most process action implementations.
FailedActionInfo Contains information about a failed action, pertaining to a single process execution context.
 

Exception Summary
ActionException An exception that can occur when executing a process Action, either on a single process instance, or on a batch of instances.
